story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Looks like all the sheltered Pokémon are
having fun!
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_0300_10: True... I suppose they find Pasio relaxing.
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I hope the people in the city also accept the
Ultra Beasts.
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I’m sure it’ll be fine! Ultra Beasts are
Pokémon, too!
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Yes, you’re right. They may feel a little hesitant
at first...
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_0700_10:
But people and Pokémon can live together
in harmony!
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_0800_10:
It doesn’t matter what power they have or what
world they come from!
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_1300_10: Oh my—if it isn’t Master Lear!
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_1500_10:
We’re still considering hiring you as one of
our retainers.
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_1600_10: Though I know this may be slightly poor timing.
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_1800_10: I have no right to ask you to stay.
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_1900_10:
But I do believe there are things you can gain if
you continue with the Aether Foundation.
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_2200_10: I...suppose it’s not a bad option.
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Master Lear, although it was I who asked you for
the job, I regret to inform you...
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_2500_10: If you ever change your mind, do come to me.
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_2700_10: Their reaction to your offer certainly wasn’t bad...
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_2800_10:
True. But I still have a few things to learn at the
Aether Foundation.
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Wouldn’t it be unfortunate if the foundation lost
its last line of defense?
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_3200_10: As the president of the Aether Foundation...
story_alola_02_09000/2401_1001_3300_10:
I must also continue to protect and love Pokémon,
the children, and the members of the foundation.
